description.short:
<@601886221072990251> Have you seen this .hyp? 

i'm mostly an AI dev as well (and a poor one at that xD) 

But maybe this working App that does something similar could help you come up with a different path to the same end-goal? 

I'm sure some other dev will also pop in at some point and guide you as well!
description.raw_message_content:
<@601886221072990251> Have you seen this .hyp? 

i'm mostly an AI dev as well (and a poor one at that xD) 

But maybe this working App that does something similar could help you come up with a different path to the same end-goal?

ai.description: Procedural plant generator that clones a monstera leaf GLB model 3-30 times, stacking clones vertically with randomized spacing, rotation, and linearly interpolated scale so each instance renders a unique monstera plant arrangement in the scene.
